title: EdYmoney
author: EdYmoney
content: Venezuelan PaypalI do not cover feesI do want 285 usdt or cryptos with the same valueI receive to my Binance wallet

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Go in the Currency exchange where this type of deal is mostly happening.Since you're a newbie, don't forget to use Recommended bitcointalk escrow services but since it's a PayPal transaction, you may have hard time to find escrow or buyer wanting to have it.However, try it and only deal with reputable ones.

comments.author: Tommyknockers
comments.body: Be careful, paypal payment scams are very common.
